name: The Witch's Brew (Abllwyd, elsss, Hauntlud)
description:
OVERVIEW:

The Witch’s Brew is a mobile android AR game. The moment to moment gameplay revolves around an immersive shop management experience themed around Witchcraft. Its narrative focuses on player choice and customer interactions, both of these interactions will lead to social, economic and narrative consequences throughout the playthrough.

DESIGN BREAKDOWN:

TRAILER:


PROTOYPE:

The Witch's Brew was an university project so we aren't planning to revisit the game, but if you like the game comment below and we can always revisit if enough people like it.
